author: hwright
msg: release.py: Allow the use of a custom directory name when posting the candidate
(main): Accept an optional dirname for posting the tarballs.

author: mpierce
msg: [RAVE-59] Directly set all file and directory permissions for fileSets in distbin.xml.  This solves the reported Mac file permission problem.  Permissions are 0700 for directories and 0644 for files (except .sh files).

author: hwright
msg: release.py: Fix a few bugs, and include the release number in the candidate
(post_candidates): Include the revision number, fix a syntax error and

author: bago
msg: Exclude jDOM and jaxb from dependencies. Make sure to declare activation as "provided" and exclude it from dependencies as we target java6 (JAMES-1269)
